titles: Euphues his censure to Philautus wherein is presented a philosophicall combat betweene Hector and Achylles, discouering in foure discourses, interlaced with diuerse delightfull tragedies, the vertues necessary to be incident in euery gentleman: had in question at the siege of Troy betwixt sondry Grecian and Troian lords: especially debated to discouer the perfection of a souldier. ... Robertus Greene, in artibus magister.
author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe for Edward White, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the litle north doore of Paules, at the signe of the Gunne,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
